Urho3D::ScriptEventInvoker Class Reference

Helper class for forwarding events to script objects that are not part of a scene. More...

#include <Urho3D/AngelScript/ScriptFile.h>

Detailed Description

Helper class for forwarding events to script objects that are not part of a scene.
